projects.title: Hybrid product recommendations using review sentiment associations
projects.description: Project field : Data Analytics .This project will investigate the ranking of the products available in market given an item of interest of a user , data will be crawled from online portals like Amazon, Flipkart etc . Using Collaborative filtering technique and F P growth Algorithm and other concepts of ML and NLP.

projects.title: Measuring Memorability of Passwords.
projects.description: Project field : Network Security worked using python to generate portmanteau words from two root words provided by the user , and these portmanteau words are made such that pronounciation should blend not just the spelling.Produces chained portmanteau words which are easy to remember and very safe . These words are suggested to be passwords for the respective site also very effective like the passwords suggested from other sources .
